ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound beef stew meat, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
2 (10.75 ounce) cans cream of mushroom soup
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
4 potatoes, peeled and cubed, or more to taste
¼ cup butter, or to taste
¼ cup milk, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 (15.25 ounce) cans whole kernel corn, drained

cookingTips: Brown beef tips in butter first to develop flavor before adding soup and milk
Cook potatoes separately until tender, then mash some to thicken the gravy naturally
Stir in corn at the end to warm through without breaking down the kernels
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain how to build a creamy, comforting gravy using condensed soup and how mashing some potatoes acts as a natural thickener.
